mainTopic.title: Prenatal genetic diagnosis
mainTopic.content_info: The uploaded materials in the PDF files are sometimes in outline form, not as continuous text, therefore it does not include every information but serves as a great foundation to form the questions and provide focus on core content, however additional background knowledge is needed to create quality revision quizzes. Some subtopics of certain topics do not follow each other in order.

quizzes.question: What are the primary indications for prenatal genetic diagnosis?
quizzes.goodAnswer: Advanced maternal age, family history of genetic disorders, and abnormal screening results.

quizzes.question: What does AFP stand for in prenatal screenings?

subTopics.title: Sonography, Triple Screen, First Trimester Screening

quizzes.question: How does sonography contribute to prenatal genetic diagnosis?
quizzes.goodAnswer: It provides detailed images of the fetus to identify structural abnormalities.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_3: It calculates gestational age using maternal diet.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_4: It checks the mother's hormone levels.

quizzes.question: What components are assessed in the triple screen test?
What does increased nuchal translucency indicate in a first trimester screening?
quizzes.goodAnswer: Higher risk of Down syndrome and other chromosomal abnormalities.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_2: Decreased risk of congenital neural tube defects.

quizzes.question: What role does PAPP-A play in pregnancy screening?
quizzes.goodAnswer: It is used to assess risks of chromosomal abnormalities in the first trimester.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_1: It predicts the gestational age of the fetus.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_3: It indicates the amount of amniotic fluid.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_4: It evaluates the size of the placenta.

quizzes.question: What is the purpose of chorionic villus sampling in genetic diagnosis?
quizzes.goodAnswer: To obtain fetal tissue for genetic analysis.

quizzes.question: What is a key advantage of first trimester screening strategies?
quizzes.wrongAnswer_1: Lower cost compared to other screenings.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_2: It predicts the exact birth weight.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_3: It provides a comprehensive nutritional profile.
quizzes.wrongAnswer_4: Shorter duration of the ultrasound procedure.
